author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a few more variables to HcalHBHEMuonVariables to analyze alternative Hcal Reco schemes

#### PR validation:

Use the cfg files in the test directories of Calibration/Hcal...

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-alca206 Add a few more variables to HcalHBHEMuonVariables to analyze alternative Hcal Reco schemes
